summary.pricing: The pricing was chosen based on competitive analysis of similar accessory subscription models in the automotive industry, offering value through bundled discounts.
summary.market_assumptions: The market is assumed to expand as more consumers opt for personalized accessories and convenience in purchasing.
summary.growth_projections_reasoning: Growth is projected based on increasing motorcycle sales and rising interest in personalized accessory bundles, leveraging BMW's strong brand presence.
summary.churn_rate_assumptions: Churn rates are estimated based on industry standards for similar subscription models, adjusted for the premium positioning of the BMW brand.
summary.customer_lifetime_value: With low churn and high brand loyalty, the customer lifetime value is expected to increase, offsetting acquisition costs and providing sustained revenue.

comparable_projects.description: Offers a subscription service for original parts and accessories tailored to Harley owners.
comparable_projects.subscription_model: Monthly subscription with options for part upgrades and exclusive content.

comparable_projects.description: Provides bundled accessory packages for Indian Motorcycle models, offering a subscription for frequent updates.
comparable_projects.subscription_model: Annual subscription with bundled discounts on accessories.

comparable_projects.description: Subscription service for Ducati riders, offering performance accessories and exclusive maintenance offers.
comparable_projects.subscription_model: Quarterly subscription focused on performance parts and rider gear.

methodology.data_sources: Data was sourced from industry reports, market analysis from competitors, and BMW's internal market research.
methodology.assumptions: Assumptions include steady growth in motorcycle sales, increased consumer interest in personalization, and stable economic conditions.
